column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We've come here a couple times for regular food (and of course ordering an almond croissant to go)
column2: but it's just been ok. We've had the fried chicken and waffles and then also the monte cristo
column3: but they just weren't memorable. Maybe I've just had bad luck
column4: but my advice would be - stick with the baked goods and be the nice friend that scoops up the extra croissant - looks like a badass present in the to-go boxes they have ;).
